mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yaopin_churu_inout_uuid_number as yaopinChuruInoutUuidNumber ,a.yaopin_churu_inout_name as yaopinChuruInoutName ,a.yaopin_churu_inout_types as yaopinChuruInoutTypes ,a.yaopin_churu_inout_content as yaopinChuruInoutContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM yaopin_churu_inout a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yaopin_churu_inout_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yaopinChuruInoutUuidNumber},'%')
and a.yaopin_churu_inout_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yaopinChuruInoutName},'%')
and a.yaopin_churu_inout_types = #{params.yaopinChuruInoutTypes}
and a.yaopin_churu_inout_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yaopinChuruInoutContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
